organization.$: Sasin Graduate Institute of Business Administration

head.citation-title: Organizational social media around the GLOBE
head.abstracts: This exploratory empirical research looks at the impact of societal culture on organizational social media. Data from 500 organizations regarding their external use of social media has been collected and analyzed. The findings indicate that societal culture is indeed a determinator of organizational social media. © 2011 IEEE.

coredata.dc:description: This exploratory empirical research looks at the impact of societal culture on organizational social media. Data from 500 organizations regarding their external use of social media has been collected and analyzed. The findings indicate that societal culture is indeed a determinator of organizational social media. © 2011 IEEE.
